lines.text:
[Tweety dodges Sylvester as he tries to snatch him from the cage]
Oh come on, stand still! How do you expect me to grab ya when ya jump around like a flea on a hot brick?

[innocently]
Oh, I'm supposed to stand still? OK, puddy tat, I stand still.
[Sylvester grabs Tweety and puts him in his mouth]
